column4: Hello (again). How to switch from -k7 to amd64 kernel? I can't find images in apt.
there are still issues running 64. no reason not to free up a partition and try it but id hold off on deleting the current install unless youre sure

you can run k7 kernel just like you can i386 umm.. it depends what you want from system.  some things are going to actually be a little more ineffecient under 64bit but on the whole the speed increase is real.
